text: idol worshipers kazhemo, "Mav BOHA willed, my by ne praktyka idolatry, ne by nashi batʹky, ne by my zaboronyayemo budʹ shcho." Takym chynom tsey pered tym, yak yim disbelieve, do vony zaznaly nashoho retribution. Skazhitʹ, vy mayte budʹ-yakyy proven znannya shcho vy mozhete ny pokazu? Vy nichoho ne slidkuyete ale prypushchennya; vy tilʹky zdohaduyetesya
